javacc.structure

Class TopicNameVariant

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacc.structure.TopicNameVariant

  • public class TopicNameVariant
extends java.lang.Object
    1+ TopicNameVariant can be contained in every TopicName.tnvList

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String resourceData
      Resource data, must be 1, represent the content of the Topic
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> scope
      Every scope is an id which refers to another Topic

      • addTopicNameVariantScope

        public void addTopicNameVariantScope(java.lang.String tnvs)
        Add a Scope to the TopicNameVariant
        Parameters:
        tnvs - Topic Name Variant Scope (a Topic ID)

      • getTopicNameVariantResourceData

        public java.lang.String getTopicNameVariantResourceData()
        Get the Resource Data from the current Topic Name Variant
        Returns:
        Resource Data which may contains UTF-8 char and represent the title. Resource should be expressed in ASCII + XHTML Entities to be full compatible to any e-book readers.

      • getTopicNameVariantScope

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTopicNameVariantScope()

        Returns:
        TopicNameVariantScope List (List of Topic IDs)
